LLM_Sentence: in december 2020, the city and southwest signed a settlement in which, among other things, the airline agreed to fully restore the sick leave hours it had canceled for certain workers between 2017 and 2020.

Justification_LLM: settlement in which, among other things, the airline agreed to fully restore the sick leave hours
